pages.text: Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje ŵao chigakaŵe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
Pandema jalichitenganyika litaka nichisikinya chakwe chamachili
Ni kwisa koposya litaka misigo jakwe jausito (ichindu yayaliji nkati mwakwe, mpela malilo ni mitapo jambiya)
Ni kwisa kuŵecheta mundu (mwawoga soni mwakusimonga kuti): “Litite uli (litaka, ana Kiyama jiyiche?)”
Lyele lisikulyo (litaka) lichiŵecheta abali syakwe syosope (sya indu yayatendekwele pachanya pakwe yambone kapena yakusakala)
Ligongo lyanti Ambuje ŵenu tachililamula lyalakwelyo (kuti liŵechete)
Lyele lisikulyo ŵandu tachipwilingana ali m'mikutula jakulekangana-lekangana kuti akaalosye masengo gao
Basi jwatapanganye chambone chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Nombe soni jwatapanganye chakusakala chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Ni syasikoposya moto mu ikotwa mwakwe (pakuwutuka m’maganga)
Chisimu mundu kwa Ambujegwe (Allah) juŵele jwakanila (ukoto waakumpa)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukuŵichila umboni pa yalakweyo (kupitila mu itendo yakwe)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe pakuchinonyela chipanje juŵele jwakupelenganya nnope
Ana ngajukumanyilila pandema jaichikoposyedwa yaili m’malembe
